category.name: PSM
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_show_option_item_prefix
preference.preference_description: Controls the visibility of the owning Item information in the Variant Condition returned by the Variant Configurator in the Product Structure application. Valid Values: - false: Hides the owning Item object for the option. - true: Displays the owning Item object for the option. This is the default value.
